```{r}

library(tidyverse)

tree_tab_second_replicate <- tibble()
post_tab_second_replicate <- tibble()
for (i in 10:14) {
  print(i)
    post_tab_second_replicate <- bind_rows(post_tab_second_replicate, read_csv(paste0('../results/replicates/post_tab_second_', i,'.csv'), show_col_types = FALSE) %>% mutate(nsim = i))
    tree_tab_second_replicate <- bind_rows(tree_tab_second_replicate, read_csv(paste0('../results/replicates/tree_tab_second_', i,'.csv'), show_col_types = FALSE) %>% mutate(nsim = i))
}
```
